languages.text: Чем дольше вы смотрите на метку, тем приглушенней становятся звуки станции. Тени удлиняются, растягиваются, словно указывая на соседнюю залу.
The longer you stare at the mark, the quieter the sounds of the station become. The shadows grow longer and seem to stretch in the direction of the adjacent section.
languages.original_text: Чем дольше вы смотрите на метку, тем приглушенней становятся звуки станции. Тени удлиняются, растягиваются, словно указывая на соседнюю залу.

traits.locale_text: The longer you stare at the mark, the quieter the sounds of the station become. The shadows grow longer and seem to stretch in the direction of the adjacent section.
The longer you stare at the mark, the quieter the sounds of the station become. The shadows grow longer and seem to stretch in the direction of the adjacent section.
The longer you stare at the mark, the quieter the sounds of the station become. The shadows grow longer and seem to stretch in the direction of the adjacent section.

The longer you stare at the mark, the quieter the sounds of the station become. The shadows grow longer and seem to stretch in the direction of the adjacent section.

languages.text: Plus vous observez la marque, plus le bruit ambiant de la station se fait lointain. Les ombres s'allongent et semblent s'étendre en direction de la section voisine.
languages.original_text: The longer you stare at the mark, the quieter the sounds of the station become. The shadows grow longer and seem to stretch in the direction of the adjacent section.

traits.locale_text: Plus vous observez la marque, plus le bruit ambiant de la station se fait lointain. Les ombres s'allongent et semblent s'étendre en direction de la section voisine.

languages.text: Cuanto más miras la marca, más silenciosos son los sonidos del puesto. Las sombras se alargan y parecen extenderse hacia la sección colindante.
languages.original_text: The longer you stare at the mark, the quieter the sounds of the station become. The shadows grow longer and seem to stretch in the direction of the adjacent section.

traits.locale_text: Cuanto más miras la marca, más silenciosos son los sonidos del puesto. Las sombras se alargan y parecen extenderse hacia la sección colindante.

languages.text: 跡を長く見つめるほど、ステーションの音が遠くなっていく。影がどんどん伸びて、隣接する区画の方向に伸びているように見えた。
languages.original_text: The longer you stare at the mark, the quieter the sounds of the station become. The shadows grow longer and seem to stretch in the direction of the adjacent section.

traits.locale_text: 跡を長く見つめるほど、ステーションの音が遠くなっていく。影がどんどん伸びて、隣接する区画の方向に伸びているように見えた。

languages.text: 你盯着图案的时间越久，周围的声音就变得越是安静。影子也变得更长，似乎在相邻区域不断向上伸展。
languages.original_text: The longer you stare at the mark, the quieter the sounds of the station become. The shadows grow longer and seem to stretch in the direction of the adjacent section.

traits.locale_text: 你盯着图案的时间越久，周围的声音就变得越是安静。影子也变得更长，似乎在相邻区域不断向上伸展。

languages.text: Je länger du das Zeichen anstarrst, desto leiser werden die Geräusche der Station. Die Schatten werden länger und scheinen sich in die Richtung der angrenzenden Sektion zu strecken.
languages.original_text: The longer you stare at the mark, the quieter the sounds of the station become. The shadows grow longer and seem to stretch in the direction of the adjacent section.

traits.locale_text: Je länger du das Zeichen anstarrst, desto leiser werden die Geräusche der Station. Die Schatten werden länger und scheinen sich in die Richtung der angrenzenden Sektion zu strecken.

languages.text: İşarete baktıkça istasyonun sesleri gitgide diniyor. Gölgeler uzayıp âdeta bitişikteki bölüme doğru uzanıyor.
languages.original_text: The longer you stare at the mark, the quieter the sounds of the station become. The shadows grow longer and seem to stretch in the direction of the adjacent section.
